Authors: Pranatta B., Carstensz J., Jihanda M., Liundi N., Warnars D.T.S., Warnars H.L.H.S.
Title: Mobile Application for Tire Sensor as Implementation Internet of Things in Transportation
Source title: 2019 7th International Conference on Cyber and IT Service Management, CITSM 2019
Affiliations: School of Computer Science, Bina Nusantara University, Computer Science Department, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia; School of Information System, Bina Nusantara University, Information Systems Department, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia; BINUS Graduate Program, Doctor of Computer Science, Bina Nusantara University, Computer Science Department, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia
Authors with affiliations: Pranatta, B., School of Computer Science, Bina Nusantara University, Computer Science Department, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia; Carstensz, J., School of Computer Science, Bina Nusantara University, Computer Science Department, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia; Jihanda, M., School of Computer Science, Bina Nusantara University, Computer Science Department, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia; Liundi, N., School of Information System, Bina Nusantara University, Information Systems Department, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia; Warnars, D.T.S., School of Information System, Bina Nusantara University, Information Systems Department, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia; Warnars, H.L.H.S., BINUS Graduate Program, Doctor of Computer Science, Bina Nusantara University, Computer Science Department, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia
Abstract: This paper headed to the role of the Internet of Things in transportation life and as one of an important thing, the Internet of Things (IoT) is getting grow and grow every day. Slowly but sure, IoT enters our experience in all things. Different visions of this IoT are reported and enabling technologies reviewed. What appears is that still significant issues must be faced by the research community. The technology that relates to IoT is still in development until now, and soon it will be used in human life. IoT embraced people to bring welfare and efficiency for every activity, played the role of technology development; IoT also shows people to think and invent more technology for every application such as vehicle and smart cities. Once it was implemented, the IoT will bring efficiency and make the activity more comfortable than before. The development of IoT also creates a vision for everybody, because it opens people's minds to technology development. Smart transportation will also be implemented in every city, and soon it will become a smart city. The efficiency and human development will pay the resources, technologies, contributions, and all works from scientists and researchers with transportation. © 2019 IEEE.
Author Keywords: intelligent transportation system; IoT in Transportation; smart transportation system; Tire Sensor
Index Keywords: Efficiency; Intelligent systems; Smart city; Enabling technologies; Intelligent transportation systems; Internet of thing (IOT); Research communities; Role of technologies; Technology development; Tire sensors; Transportation system; Internet of things
